SELECT count(*) AS totalCount FROM board_free AS bf JOIN member AS mb WHERE bf.use_flag = 'Y' AND bf.bf_cate_idx = #{bf_cate_idx} AND bf.mem_idx = mb.mem_idx
AND ( bf.bf_title LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
AND ( bf.reg_date LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
AND ( mb.mem_name LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
SELECT count(*) FROM recommend WHERE bf_cate_idx = #{bf_cate_idx};

SELECT bf.bf_idx, bf.bf_title, mb.mem_name, bf.reg_date, bf.mod_date, bf.bf_cate_idx, bf.use_sec, bf.mem_idx, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM view_count WHERE bf.bf_idx = view_count.bf_idx ) AS view_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_free_reply WHERE board_free_reply.bf_idx = bf.bf_idx AND board_free_reply.use_flag = 'Y' ) AS replyCnt FROM board_free as bf JOIN member as mb WHERE bf.use_flag = 'Y' AND bf.mem_idx = mb.mem_idx AND bf.bf_cate_idx = #{bf_cate_idx} AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommend WHERE recommend.bf_idx = bf.bf_idx ) != 0 ORDER BY bf.bf_idx desc;

SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS RNUM, bf.bf_idx, bf.bf_title, mb.mem_name, bf.reg_date, bf.mod_date, bf.bf_cate_idx, bf.use_sec, bf.mem_idx, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM view_count WHERE bf.bf_idx = view_count.bf_idx ) AS view_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_free_reply WHERE board_free_reply.bf_idx = bf.bf_idx AND board_free_reply.use_flag = 'Y' ) AS replyCnt FROM board_free as bf, ( SELECT @rownum := 0 ) AS R JOIN member as mb WHERE bf.use_flag = 'Y' AND bf.mem_idx = mb.mem_idx AND bf.bf_cate_idx = #{bf_cate_idx} AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommend WHERE recommend.bf_idx = bf.bf_idx ) = 0
AND ( bf.bf_title LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
AND ( bf.reg_date LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
AND ( mb.mem_name LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
ORDER BY bf.bf_idx desc, RNUM desc LIMIT #{listStart}, #{perPageNumber};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO view_count ( bf_idx, mem_idx ) SELECT #{bf_idx}, #{mem_idx} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM view_count WHERE bf_idx = #{bf_idx} AND mem_idx = #{mem_idx} );
INSERT INTO board_free ( bf_title, bf_contents, mem_idx, reg_date, bf_cate_idx, use_sec ) VALUES ( #{bf_title}, #{bf_contents}, #{mem_idx}, default, #{bf_cate_idx}, #{use_sec} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board_free as bf JOIN member as mb WHERE bf.mem_idx = mb.mem_idx AND bf_idx = #{bf_idx};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommend ( bf_idx, mem_idx, bf_cate_idx ) SELECT #{bf_idx}, #{mem_idx}, #{bf_cate_idx} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM recommend WHERE bf_idx = #{bf_idx} AND mem_idx = #{mem_idx} );
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM recommend WHERE bf_idx = #{bf_idx} AND mem_idx = #{mem_idx};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM recommend WHERE bf_idx = #{bf_idx} AND mem_idx = #{mem_idx};
mapper.select: SELECT bf.bf_idx, bf.bf_title, bf.use_sec, mb.mem_name, bf.mem_idx FROM board_free as bf JOIN member AS mb WHERE bf.bf_idx IN ( SELECT MAX(bf_idx) FROM board_free WHERE bf_idx < #{bf_idx} AND use_flag = 'Y' AND bf_cate_idx = #{bf_cate_idx} ) AND bf.mem_idx = mb.mem_idx;

SELECT bf.bf_idx, bf.bf_title, bf.use_sec, mb.mem_name, bf.mem_idx FROM board_free as bf JOIN member AS mb WHERE bf.bf_idx IN ( SELECT MIN(bf_idx) FROM board_free WHERE bf_idx > #{bf_idx} AND use_flag = 'Y' AND bf_cate_idx = #{bf_cate_idx} ) AND bf.mem_idx = mb.mem_idx;
mapper.update: UPDATE board_free SET use_flag = 'N' WHERE bf_idx = #{bf_idx};
UPDATE board_free SET bf_title = #{bf_title}, bf_contents = #{bf_contents}, mod_date = current_timestamp, use_sec = #{use_sec} WHERE bf_idx = #{bf_idx};
